message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a special price tailored for you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $1,200,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure an asset that exceeds your expectations at a price that is still significantly higher than what others might pay. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.
